system.description:
Effect: All valid targets are @Affliction[bound] 5. While @Affliction[bound], they take two Ticks of HP in damage at the end of each of their activations.
The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.
Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Charizard and has a Fire-Type attack on their Active List.
